data.eml:eml: A new species of Lathrobium Gravenhorst (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae) from Shaanxi, Central China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peng, Zhong, Li, Li-Zhen, Zhao, Mei-Jun (2013): A new species of Lathrobium Gravenhorst (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae) from Shaanxi, Central China. Zootaxa 3608 (2): 158-160, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3608.2.7
